name: One Man Bomb Squad
description:
This is a submission to the BenBonk game jam #1

[WARNING] The voicelines in the tutorial are bugged and don't work very well.

Controls: 
A/D To move around.

Aim with your mouse and left click to shoot.

Space to jump and use you're rocket boots.

Get to the end of a level to finish it.


If i had more time:
- The Tutorials Voice-lines don't work very well i would keep working on that if i had time.
- More levels.
- Level Counter.
- Showing dialogue under the voice-lines.


If you have trouble understanding the voice-lines here they are
 https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FCkN6IqFJLGcmkXmnhclv_reJOvzLlH80Ii84fBtCxo/...

Credits:
- Music: https://ecrettmusic.com/play
I made everything else.

Tools:
- Unity Game Engine (Game engine)
- Aseprite (Pixel Art)
- SFXR (Sound Effects)
- Audacity (Voicelines)
